items.name: Paneer Angara
items.description: A north Indian dish made with Indian cottage, onion and capsicum marinated in hung curd and variety of spices, smoked and cooked in a thicky gravy.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + achar + papad + side salad

items.name: Chicken Handi
items.description: A traditional dish from north India made with marinated pieces of chicken cooked in a thick tomato-based sauce with a variety of spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice/2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Mix vegetable pancake
items.description: A dish made by mixing grated or finely chopped vegetables like carrots, bell peppers, zucchini, onion and cabbage with flour, yogurt and spices. Served with a side of onion tomato chutney. (4 pancakes)

items.name: Chicken Tehari
items.description: One pot chicken rice cooked with caramalised onion, tomato, ginger-garlic paste and fresh garam masala

items.name: Mushroom Ghee Roast
items.description: A Manglorean dish made by sauteing sliced mushrooms in ghee with a mix of Indian spices and then roasted until mushrooms get a cispy outer layer.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + achar + papad + side salad

items.name: Chicken Ghee Roast
items.description: Manglorean chicken dish cooked with ghee, onion and dried red chili paste and garnished with fresh corriander
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Bhel Puri
items.description: Street style snack of puffed rice mixed with spicy chutney, sweet tangy chutney, papadi, sev, onion, tomato and fresh coriander making it a flavourful snack.

items.name: Idiyappam & Kadala Curry
items.description: A rice noodle dish from the south of India. Made of steamed rice flour noodles. Served with black chickpea curry.

items.name: Kashmiri Rajma Masala
items.description: Red kidney beans in a tomato based gravy with variey of spices. A dish from the state of Jammu and Kashmir.
items.extra: make a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Dhaniwal Korma
items.description: A delicious dish from the state of Kashmir. Lamb meat cooked with yogurt, ginger, garlic, coriander powder and other spices; slow cooked for a few hours.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad

items.name: Rajma Tikki
items.description: A north Indian street food dish made by mashing cooked red kidney beans and then forming them into patties, which are shallow fried. Served with spicy green chutney. (4 tikkis)

items.name: Gujrati Dal Rice
items.description: A traditional dal dish from Gujarat, made with a combination of lentils, such as toor dal, chana dal, and moong dal, and seasoned with ginger, garlic, cumin, coriander, and other spices. Served with rice.

items.name: Veg Jaipuri
items.description: A dish from rajasthan is made with a mix of vegetables cooked together with red chili and tomato paste
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + achar + papad + side salad

items.name: Junglee Maas
items.description: A dish from Rajasthan. A traditional spicy lamb dish which is cooked with a combination of aromatic spices and yogurt.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Sweet Potato Tikki
items.description: Spiced sweet potato patty shallow fried and served with spicy green chutney. (4 tikkis)

items.name: Tomato Rice
items.description: Rice cooked with onions & tomato, tempered with mustard seeds, peanuts and fresh curry leaves. Served with papad.

items.name: Veg Chowmein
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese dish made with assorted veggies cooked together with rice and noodles with flavourful chinese sauces and aromatic spices.

items.name: Chicken Chowmein
items.description: Assorted veggies and chicken stir fried and cooked together with rice and noodles with flavourful chinese sauces and aromatic spices.

items.name: Dhokla
items.description: Dhokla is a traditional Gujarati dish made from a fermented batter of chickpea flour, rice flour and yogurt or curd. Steamed and then cut into small, square pieces.

items.name: Palak Lasun kichidi
items.description: A dish made by cooking rice and lentils with spinach and garlic. It is a flavorful, healthy and nutritious dish, that is often enjoyed as a main course. Served with yogurt and achar.

items.name: Veg Korma
items.description: Mix veggies cooked in yogurt based gravy with cramalised onion, cashew and freshly ground spices topped with fresh cream
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Chicken Mappas
items.description: A traditional Kerala dish made by simmering chicken in a coconut milk-based sauce with spices like ginger, garlic, green chilies, and turmeric.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha/rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Madur Vade
items.description: A deep-fried Indian snack hailing from the state of Karnataka. It is made by mixing a batter of rice flour, semolina and cumin seeds, shaped into small doghnut shapes and fried. Served with chutney.

items.name: Puliohara
items.description: A popular traditional dish from Andhra Pradesh, made by cooking rice in tamarind juice with spices and seasoning it with peanuts and chana dal.

items.name: Bengali Aloo Dum
items.description: A Bengali dish made by simmering potatoes in a gravy of tomatoes, ginger, garlic and a variety of spices
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Bengali Chicken Curry
items.description: Bengali-style chicken curry is a dish made by marinating chicken in a mixture of yogurt and spices, then cooking it in a gravy made from a blend of onion, tomato, ginger, garlic, and a variety of whole and powdered spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha/rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Oats-Rava Idli
items.description: Steamed cakes made of oats and semolina (granulated wheat) mixed with yogurt, onion, cashew and chilles. Served with coconut chutney.

items.name: Pav Bhaji
items.description: Mix of different veggies boiled and cooked in a spicy flavourful gravy of onion, tomato and fresh pav bhaji masala topped with butter and fresh corriander served with 2 buns

items.name: Hyderabadi Nizam Handi
items.description: A famous delicacy of Hyderabad made by slow cooking mutton or chicken in a sealed clay pot with a blend of spices, yogurt and vegetables, resulting in a rich flavorful gravy.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Hyderabadi Laal Ghost
items.description: Laal Ghost is a traditional dish from Hyderabad made by slow-cooking lamb in a spicy, red chili-based gravy
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha/rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Methi Ghatiya
items.description: A popular dish from Gujarat. It is a type of fritters made from gram flour mixed with finely chopped fenugreek leaves and a blend of spices, then deep-fried until crispy. Served with green chutney

items.name: Bhindi Kadi & Rice
items.description: Crispy Okra cooked in a flavourful yogurt based gravy with spices. Served with steamed rice.

items.name: Pinde Chole Pulao
items.description: A combination of spicy cholle (chickpeas) and flavorful pulao (rice) cooked together with a blend of spices, ginger, garlic and tomatoes. Served with yogurt raita + papad + achar

items.name: Amritsari Chicken Masala
items.description: A popular dish from Amritsar made by marinating chicken in a special blend of spices, then cooking it in a gravy made from tomatoes, onion, ginger, and garlic. It is known for its rich, flavorful and spicy taste
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha/rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Aloo Tikki
items.description: Boiled potatoes mashed and mixed with different spices, fresh coriander and shaped into a patty and shallow fried. Served with tomato ketchup. (4 tikki)

items.name: Elichery
items.description: A traditional dish from the southern state of Kerala. It's a mildly spicy pumpkin curry made with a blend of coconut, cumin & chilli. It is a comfort meal in keralitie household. Served with rice.

items.name: Veg Chopper Rice
items.description: Indo-Chinese dish made by cooking chopped vegetables like carrots, beans and cabbage along with rice and a blend of spices. It is topped with a spicy flavourful mix veg Indo-chinese gravy.

items.name: Chicken Chopper Rice
items.description: Chicken chopper rice is a dish made by cooking egg and chopped vegetables like carrots, beans and cabbage along with rice and a blend of spices. It is a popular main course dish served with a spicy delicious chicken gravy on top of the rice.

items.name: Chicken Chilly
items.description: A dish made by stir-frying marinated chicken with diced bell peppers, onions and chilies in a sauce made with soy sauce and other spices. It's a spicy and savory dish, often served as a appetizer or side dish.

items.name: Coconut Rice
items.description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked in ghee with cashew, curry leaves, dried chilli and fresh coconut, tempered with mustard seeds
